casebody.data:
The CITY OF CHARLOTTE
v.
UNIVERSITY FINANCIAL PROPERTIES, LLC, et al. 183PA16-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 27, 2019 Benjamin R. Sullivan, Jr., Attorney at Law, Nicolas E. Tosco, Attorney at Law, Charles C. Meeker, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, DeWitt McCarley, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for The City of Charlotte. Martin L. White, Attorney at Law, R. Susanne Todd, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, David V. Brennan, Attorney at Law, for University Financial Properties, LLC. Jessica Odom Wilkie, Attorney at Law, Joshua D. Hansen, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for NC Advocates for Justice.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th of February 2019 by Defendant (University Financial Properties, LLC) for Withdrawal of Issues Presented in Conditional Petition:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of March 2019."
